channel.title: Getting the Server/client to work
channel.description:
I'm very nooby at this, I've gotten a server and client up one time online. I've been trying to do it again recently and every server and client I try.. just is so difficult, I've been trying to use mulitple guides since alot of them don't give 100% details. I also haven't been able to find "Server =" on clients. and my complier and @run won't work... I'm going to keep looking for a server/client that'll run fine. I've made my no-ip, I think I portfowarded, and I also changed my Path and classpath.. But not sure if its 100% right. I'm just so confused :/
But need help ASAP!!! Thanks!
My skype name is : Michael.Bradley.Arnold

item.title: Getting the Server/client to work
item.dc:creator: @inspectah inspectah
item.description:
@inspectah wrote:

Try looking through this https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=363007.0

Read full topic

item.title: Getting the Server/client to work
item.dc:creator: @stEps stEps
item.description:
@stEps wrote:

you probably would want to start out with Easyrsc. Look for a tutorial called “editing easyrsc” by Yong Min. Another suggestion would be to first get it online by Localhost.

Read full topic
